category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_use_item_not_configured_rev
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of business object types for which system should use their Item object and not the configured revision. Business object types defined in this preference would be excluded to switch to the configured revision while dealing with the favorites and the tiles. Valid values are: Internal names of the business object of type Item or its subtype.
